issue_description: Need complete implementation of patch application system - GovernedApplyPath doesn't exist yet. Provide full working implementation that can be dropped in.
context: Previous analysis identified need for GovernedApplyPath class but it doesn't exist in codebase. Need: 1) Complete governed_apply.py module with GovernedApplyPath class, 2) Updated autonomous_executor.py that uses it, 3) Complete _post_builder_result() method with all required fields. Must be production-ready code that actually writes patches to disk using git apply or file I/O.
